titleStmt.title: A speech delivered in the House of Commons, July 7th: 1641. being resolved into a committee, (so neer as it could be collected together) in the Palatine cause. By Sr. Simonds D'Ewes.
titleStmt.author: D'Ewes, Simonds, Sir, 1602-1650.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
